meanings.definition: As stated or declared openly or publicly.
meanings.sent1: She professedly admitted her mistake in front of everyone.
meanings.sent2: He professedly claimed to have seen a UFO last night.
meanings.sent3: The cat professedly declared ownership of the entire house.
meanings.sent4: The sun professedly announced the arrival of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher professedly praised the student for their hard work.

meanings.sent1: The company professedly promised to deliver the package by tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The suspect professedly denied any involvement in the crime.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel professedly claimed to have hidden its acorns in a secret location.
meanings.sent4: The wind professedly whispered secrets through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The magician professedly made the rabbit disappear in a puff of smoke.
